title: Substitute
text: First, substitute the given point into the equation. If the equality that results is true, then the point is a solution to the system.

title: Substitute
text: When the point is substituted into the equation $$5x-y=4$$, do both sides equal each other?

title: Interpret
text: Since the equation is not equal on both $$sides(18=4)$$, the ordered pair is not a solution to the system.
